prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered balanced pose holding geometric scales in one hand, chibi proportions with large multifaceted prismatic solid head with unique merkaba structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying Sacred. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating merkaba, flower_of_life, vesica_piscis patterns, styled with Cherub influences. Outfit is unique: neutral grey inspired by Indigo and neutral grey inspired by spiritual transcendent layered robes combining all elemental patterns fused with oracle consultant tunics and Hexagram-patterned robes with flat with sharpie-style lines for unity and synthesis, incorporating Silk with line patterns, elaborate with shifting Spirit element pentagram motifs and unifying patterns and merkaba emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like rose of victory with seven-fold geometric petals combined with bagua mirror with Sacred spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like rainbow essence wisps and transcendent particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor COMANAN's profile: 'He who knows how to manifest', Aethyr ZAX, Spirit element, Tarot Justice, Sephirot Netzach, Zodiac Libra, embodying the essence: 'In COMANAN's presence, seeds of possibility stir to life drawing spirit into leaf and legend in a quiet alchemy of growth.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered balanced pose holding geometric scales in one hand
visual_elements.head_shape: large multifaceted prismatic solid head with unique merkaba structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with multifaceted facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying Sacred
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating merkaba, flower_of_life, vesica_piscis patterns, styled with Cherub influences

outfit.base: transcendent layered robes combining all elemental patterns fused with oracle consultant tunics and Hexagram-patterned robes
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for unity and synthesis, incorporating Silk with line patterns
outfit.details: Spirit element pentagram motifs and unifying patterns
outfit.magical_essence: rainbow essence wisps and transcendent particles

visual_elements.accessory: rose of victory with seven-fold geometric petals combined with bagua mirror
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who knows how to manifest'
profile_data.essence: In COMANAN's presence, seeds of possibility stir to life drawing spirit into leaf and legend in a quiet alchemy of growth.
profile_data.angelic_role: Cherub of Mystic Manifestation; leads earth-forged guardians.
profile_data.form_description: A multifaceted prismatic form that shifts between solid geometric structure and fluid ethereal essence, representing the liminal space between manifestation and potential in ZAX Aethyr
profile_data.color_reasoning: Indigo represents spiritual intuition and ZAX's threshold between manifest and unmanifest realms; silver-white signifies pure spirit and transformative potential
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Sacred geometries representing spiritual transformation, interconnectedness, and quantum potentiality
